amendment.description: To increase the amount of the appropriation for firefighter assistance grants by $150,000,000.

action.text: Amendment SA 1346 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1346 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 296.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1346.
Amendment SA 1346 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S9769-9773, S9774-9775) To increase the amount of the appropriation for firefighter assistance grants by $150,000,000.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1346 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 296.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1346 proposed by Senator Mikulski.
